title: 2 very rare Obak error cards for sale
author: Archive

posts.post_title: 2 very rare Obak error cards for sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: scott brockelman
I have 2 very rare 1910 Obak error cards for sale.

1. Upside down and miscut back Van Buren/"Stand the Test" I had one other that was next to this one on the sheet and sold with my back collection a couple of years ago, other than that I have seen one other example of the upside down back. $500 delivered

2. Wet sheet transfer Seaton, very crisp blue wet sheet transfer, so clear you can see the dot matrix. I have not seen another wet sheet transfer of this magnitude on an Obak card. It is much bluer and distinct in person, the picture is a bit washed out. $500 delivered

Scott
